content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine-1 at position(8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter (burner-inserter) at position(10.5, 13.5)
- Output wooden chest at position(11.5, 13.5)
- Input copper plate chest at position(9.5, 11.5) containing 4 copper plates
- Input iron gear wheel chest at position(9.5, 10.5) containing 10 iron gear wheels

### Iron Plate Production at position(-25.0, -59.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-28.0, -61.0)
- Input chest at position(-27.5, -59.5)
- Input inserter at position(-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-25.0, -59.0)
- Output inserter at position(-23.5, -58.5)
- Output chest at position(-22.5, -58.5) containing 2 iron plates

### Iron Plate Production at position(-15.0, -51.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-18.0, -53.0)
- Input chest at position(-17.5, -51.5)
- Input inserter at position(-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at position(-15.0, -51.0)
- Output inserter at position(-13.5, -50.5)
- Output chest at position(-12.5, -50.5) containing 44 iron plates

### Coal Mining at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(41.0, -82.0)
- Output chest at position(41.5, -80.5) containing 252 coal
- Output inserter at position(41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at position(-3.5, 27.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 16.0)
- Steam engine at position(-4.5, 12.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting power consumers

### Copper Plate Production at position(14.0, 14.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position(14.0, 14.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities near existing structures
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones
- Increase spacing or change direction when placing near other entities
- Consider the tile dimensions of entities when planning placement

### Errors with inserter placement
- Verify there is enough space for both the inserter and its drop/pickup positions
- Consider the direction and spacing requirements when placing inserters
- Check for conflicts with other structures like electric poles or chests

### Entity pickup errors
- Verify the entity exists at the specified position before attempting pickup
- Double check coordinates when trying to remove entities

### Power system related issues
- Ensure proper fuel supply to boilers
- Maintain connection between power producers and consumers through electric poles

### Resource flow issues
- Monitor input/output chest contents
- Ensure proper inserter directions for material flow
- Verify assembling machine has all required ingredients
